thread.section_title: zFast Technologies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zFast Technologies | zfast.co.uk
thread.title: Laura Montgomery-Hurrell
thread.title_full: zFast Technologies reviewed by Laura Montgomery-Hurrell

author: Laura Montgomery-Hurrell
title: Laura Montgomery-Hurrell
text:
I've been using zFast to host the audio streaming server for my community's online radio for nearly 4 years and have never had any trouble with up-time, communication or standard of service. It's always been the same low price, with helpful resources.
Even when we recently switched from SHOUTCast V1 to V2, the price did not change (for which, as a non-profit, I'm grateful for) and the speed and professionalism that the switch was dealt with was impeccable.
Thoroughly decent company to work with.
